snippet.title: Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten - Gameplay Trailer (PS4, PS5)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://utawarerumono.com/monochrome-mobius/

The world of Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten is full of secrets and unknown dangers. To survive, you'll need to strike first! Use the Action Ring to influence combat turn order and gain the advantage, call upon powerful allies to aid you, and activate Overzeal to outpace your enemies.

Coming September 5, 2023 to PS4 and PS5!

#Utawarerumono #MonochromeMobius
